title: Install MCP SDK dependency
description: Add @modelcontextprotocol/sdk package to enable MCP server implementation. Required for exposing database operations as MCP tools.
steps: Add @modelcontextprotocol/sdk to dependencies in /Users/tomkis/dev/ralphban/packages/server/package.json
Run pnpm install to install the package

title: Create service layer for tasks
description: Create service layer that would be responsible for providing tasks ready for implementation as well as marking task as completed.
steps: Create new service that would use repository
Add function for getting all tasks ready for implementation
Add function for marking task as completed

title: Create MCP server module
description: Create core MCP server that exposes task service as tools. Server must list available tools and handle tool execution requests.
steps: Create /Users/tomkis/dev/ralphban/packages/server/src/mcp/server.ts
Setup MCP server
Implement HTTP streamable transport
Initialize MCP server with name 'ralphban-task-server' and version '0.0.1'
Export createMCPServer function that returns configured server instance

title: Implement get_all_tasks tool
description: Create MCP tool to retrieve all tasks from database. Returns complete task list with id, category, title, description, steps, state, timestamps.
steps: Provide implementation for get_tasks_ready_for_implementation tool
Provide implementation for mark_task_done tool

title: Add MCP HTTP endpoint to Express server
description: Expose MCP server via HTTP POST endpoint with streaming responses. Endpoint should accept MCP JSON-RPC requests and stream tool execution results.
steps: Add new route /api/mcp to Express server
Connect the previously created MCP server to the new route

title: Create new integration test package
description: Create new package within monorepo for integration testing, currently we only need to test MCP server.
steps: Add new package @ralphban/integration-tests to monorepo
Initialize this as vite project
Make sure this project is using typescript
Make sure the tests can be run using pnpm test
Add empty test

title: Implement test that verifies MCP server is working
description: List get_tasks_ready_for_implementation tool and see whether some data are returned
steps: Install mcp as a dependency to the integration test package
Create MCP client that connects to the MCP server
Create one test that calls get_tasks_ready_for_implementation tool and verifies that some data are returned
console.log the data that are returned
